review: I enjoy the Google Chromecast.  The video quality with Netflix and HULU is clean.  I can stream almost anything with my Google Chrome browser to the TV.  I can't wait to see what other apps are going to be coming out with it in the future. I would love it if Amazon Prime would upgrade to become compatible with ChromeCast. Currently we cannot stream Amazon Prime from my PC using the Google Chrome browser to Chromecast either.  I am able to use my phone as a remote and continue doing other functions on my phone while my shows are playing.  All in all this product does exactly as it is advertised.  It is easy to use and install.  I enjoy using it and would recommend it to anyone who wants a good quality product.
author: Linsey

review: Pretty nifty little device, but the commercials make it seem like it's like a flash drive you just slide into your HDMI slot. But in reality, you need power, so you either need to connect the other end to a USB connection or a power outlet to make it work. On a really thin form factor TV, this doesn't look so good...Functionality is great though if you tend to start watching or browsing for things to watch on your phone or tablet first, as it makes casting it onto your TV super easy and convenient.
